Developer Terms of Use
des:
Control your home comfortably - anytime, anywhere - with the self-learning Smart Home App. Easy to install, Smart Home learns from your daily routine, adapts automatically to your habits and gets better and better every day. 

And best of all: Smart Home Solution also works with Amazon Alexa.

With the Smart Home Solution skill for Amazon Alexa you can turn your lights and smart switches on and off comfortably by voice control. Smart switches and Amazon Alexa enable you to turn devices (e. g. floor lamp, printer, coffee machine,...) on and off easily. Smart bulbs can also be dimmed by voice command. 

Examples:
- Alexa, turn on "office light"
- Alexa, turn off "Printer".
- Alexa, dim the "ceiling lamp" to 40 percent
- Alexa, set the "childrens room" to pink
- Alexa, set "living room" to 23 degrees

Currently supported:
- Smart switches
- Smart bulbs
- Heat Zones

For detailed information on connecting and managing your Smart Home devices, please visit https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=201749200

Further details on Smart Home can be found at https://www.a1.group/en/meta/smarthome
